lead_paragraph: Liverpool's new German goalkeeper Loris Karius is set to be out for up to 10 weeks with a broken hand suffered in a 1-0 friendly defeat by Chelsea during the club's U.S. tour, British media reported on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Liverpool's New Goalkeeper Karius Suffers Broken Hand
headline.main: Liverpool's New Goalkeeper Karius Suffers Broken Hand
